Author: Pradebban Raja
Summary: This PowerShell Workflow runbook connects to Azure using an Automation Run As account and Starts/Stops all VMScalesets (VMSS) in a resource group in-parallel. You can attach a recurring schedule to this runbook to run it at a specific time.
Title: Stop-Start-VMSS(VM Scalesets)
UserTags: Windows Azure PowerShell, Virtual Machines, Azure Powershell
